dagger.description:
[Basic Attack]:Deals [Damage Rate: 100%] Physical
Damage and applies 1 stack of [Bleed].

Can cast [Bleeding Thrust] every 6s.
Dash toward an enemy target, dealing [Damage Rate:
160%] Physical Damage and inflicting 2 stacks of [Bleed]

[Basic Attack]:Deals [Damage Rate: 100%] Physical
Damage and applies 1 stack of [Bleed].

Can cast [Ricochet] every 6s.
Throws a blade at the target that deals [Damage Rate:
120%] Physical Damage, inflicts 1 stack of [Bleed], and
reduces their Movement Speed by 40% for 2s. After which
it bounces to 1 enemy behind up to 4 times

[Basic Attack]:Deals [Damage Rate: 100%] Physical
Damage and applies 1 stack of [Bleed].

Can cast [Armor Breaker] every 5s.
Deals [Damage Rate: 200%] Physical Damage to nearby
enemies, inflicting 1 stack of [Bleed], and reducing their
Armor by 15% for 4s.

Throws 3 blades forward. Each blade deals 
[Damage Rate: 80%] Physical Damage to all enemies hit. Upon
reaching max range, the blades return, dealing 
[Damage Rate: 80%] Physical Damage to those hit and inflicting 1
stack of [Bleed]
Multiple blade hits on the same target beyond the first
deal 30% reduced damage

Dashes 3m backward while firing a Phase Blade forward
that deals [Damage Rate: 100%] Physical Damage to the
first enemy hit, inflicting 1 stack of [Bleed] and Stunning
for 0.75s, while also marking them for 5s.
Recast the skill within 15m while a mark exists to
instantly appear behind the target, dealing [Damage Rate:
160%] Physical Damage and gaining +30% Attack Speed
for 5s

Strike an enemy twice, dealing [Damage Rate: 180%]
Physical Damage, applying 1 stack of [Bleed] and
Disarming them for 4s. Increases Basic Attack Damage by
25% for 5s.

Throws a smoke grenade to create a smoke screen for 6s.
Enemies inside are Slowed by 40% and have a 55% chance
to miss Basic Attacks. Also deals [Damage Rate: 25%]
Physical Damage every second

Instantly removes control effects and enters Stealth.
While in Stealth, gains immunity to movement-limiting
effects (Slow, Immobilize) for 2s. Also increases damage
by 7% for 6s, stacking up to 2 times.
Can be recast once within 6s, but doing so will not remove
control effects again.
Using a skill, dealing damage or inflicting healing breaks
Stealth

Dealing damage inflicts [Bleed], dealing [Damage Rate:
30%] Physical Damage every second for 8s, stacking up to
6 times (stacks do not boost damage).
At max stacks, triggers Hemorrhage, dealing 
[Damage Rate: 100%] Physical Damage + True Damage equal to 4%
of the target's current HP and removes all [Bleed] stacks.
Basic Attack Damage Bonuses affect the base damage
and basic attack critical hits can cause the damage to
crit.

Leaps to the target and strikes, dealing [Damage Rate
220%] Physical Damage and applying 2 stacks of [Bleed].
Recovers [Healing Rate: 110%] HP.
Gains 1 charge every 20s, up to 2 charges

Dashes toward the target direction, leaving a dagger
behind. Upon arrival, deals [Damage Rate: 180%] Physical
Damage and drains 20 MP from nearby enemies, inflicting
2 stacks of Bleed. Can be recast within 5s to return to the
dagger's location, dealing [Damage Rate: 180%] Physical
Damage and draining 20 MP from nearby enemies,
inflicting 2 stacks of [Bleed].

Inflicts the enemy with a Soul Snare, dealing 
[Damage Rate: 150%] Physical Damage and linking with the target,
silencing both parties for 5s. During this period, the caster
gains [Soul Snare]. The link breaks if distance exceeds
12m.

[Soul Snare]
Critical Rate: +30%
Damage Resistance: +50%
Attack Speed: +30%
Cannot use skills

Thrusts in the target's direction, dealing [Damage Rate:
140%] Physical Damage and inflicting 2 stacks of [Bleed].
Skill's second stage can be cast within 5s: Dash toward
target direction, dealing [Damage Rate: 225%] Physical
Damage and inflicting 2 stacks of [Bleed] to all enemies
hit. Deals [Damage Rate: 450%] Physical Damage against
enemies with less than 40% HP.

Deals [Damage Rate: 200%] Physical Damage + True
Damage equal to 10% of the target's Max HP to nearby
enemies, while also inflicting 2 stacks of [Bleed].
If this skill triggers Hemorrhage, recovers 10% of Max HP
and gains 40%+ Movement Speed for 3s.

Leaps to the target location, dealing [Damage Rate: 360%]
Physical Damage to nearby enemies upon landing,
inflicting 3 stacks of [Bleed] and [Heal Block] for 4s.
Affected enemies cannot be affected by [Heal Block]
again for 12s.
If this skill triggers Hemorrhage, cooldown is set to 12s.
[Heal Block]: Cannot receive healing.

dagger.changes:
- First Segment Cast Range 13m -> 10m
- Second Segment Cast Range 8m -> 6m
dagger.description:
Dashes forward, dealing [Damage Rate: 150%] Physical
Damage to all enemies hit, inflicting 2 stacks of [Bleed],
and reducing Damage Resistance by 20% for 4s.
Skill's second stage can be cast within 5s:
Deals [Damage Rate: 300%] Physical Damage to enemies
in a frontal cone, inflicts 3 stacks of [Bleed] while also
leaping backward
